title: Gatling Enterprise Overview
description:
This dashboard shows what you can achieve with the Gatling Enterprise Integration:

-   Events: Injection start and end
-   Requests and responses: total count and by status
-   Response Times: 95th, 99th, and 99.9th percentiles
-   Users: start, end, and concurrent
-   Bandwidth usage sent and received
-   TCP: count and time min, max, 95th, 99th, and 99.9th percentiles
-   TLS: count and time min, max, 95th, 99th, and 99.9th percentiles

definition.content:
Gatling Enterprise is a load testing platform designed to help teams validate application scalability and performance under real-world traffic conditions.

With the Datadog integration, teams can investigate performance issues by correlating load test metrics (e.g., response times, throughput, errors) with infrastructure data tracked in Datadog.

This dashboard shows what you can achieve with the Gatling Enterprise Integration:

- Events: Injection start and end
- Requests and responses: total count and by status
- Response Times: 95th, 99th, and 99.9th percentiles
- Users: start, end, and concurrent
- Bandwidth usage sent and received
- TCP: count and time min, max, 95th, 99th, and 99.9th percentiles
- TLS: count and time min, max, 95th, 99th, and 99.9th percentiles
